mapper.sql: sid, user_id, ip, session_id, description, request_url, request_param, request_time, result, return_time, source_type, operation_type, filler1, filler2, filler3
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_operate_audit
order by ${orderByClause}
